fullplot: Story of two brothers told from the perspective of older brother who recalls his childhood memories where he runs away from home and returns after 20 years. The rest of the film is all about mental turmoil, as he is caught between the deep love showered by his younger brother who runs a successful advertising agency and his guilt of not being a responsible son or elder brother.

title: Veyyil

tomatoes.consensus: My Best Friend's Girl spends too much time being vulgar and offensive, leaving little room for laughs.
